thread.title: Manchester United target Victor Lindelof returns to Benfica side as Old Trafford links continue
thread.title_full: Manchester United target Victor Lindelof returns to Benfica side as Old Trafford links continue

author: Liam Prenderville
title: Manchester United target Victor Lindelof returns to Benfica side as Old Trafford links continue
text:
Sport Manchester United target Victor Lindelof returns to Benfica side as Old Trafford links continue The Swedish defender was identified as Jose Mourinho's No.1 January transfer target but a deal is yet to materialise and the United boss has played down the chances of sealing a deal Share Victor Lindelof in action (Photo: Getty Images Europe) Share Get Manchester United FC updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Victor Lindelof has returned to the Benfica side as speculation over a move to Manchester United continues. 
The Swedish defender was identified as Jose Mourinho's No.1 January transfer target but a deal is yet to materialise. 
Jose Mourinho insisted this week that he would not look to sign a new defender this month but he is thought to be keen on securing a deal. 
Lindelof had missed Benfica's recent cup matches, fuelling speculation he would be on the move. 
However, he was back involved as his side continued their winning run against Vitoria Guimaraes. Victor Lindelof continues to be linked with United (Photo: Getty) 
Jonas opened the scoring for Benfica early on after good work from Eduardo Salvio. 
Former Fulham flop extended his side's lead - and the gap at the top of the table - with a second before the break. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
